그냥 혹평을 해주고 싶은 게 어때，쓰레기 게임 쓰레기 물건이다。

[h1] 回避枠が足りねえ！[/h1]

「この人とまた同じチームで戦いたい」と思えるプレイヤーの10倍くらい「こいつとは二度と一緒にやりたくない」と思うプレイヤーがこのゲームには存在する
このゲームには［回避プレイヤー］というシステムがあって、そこに自分の嫌いなプレイヤーを登録するとそいつが味方チームに来なくなるという優れものなのだが、そこに登録できるプレイヤー数の上限がたったの3名までだ
たった3枠の回避リストなど、ランクマッチを2、3戦回しただけでもう埋まってしまう　そのくらい回避したいクソプレイヤーが多い（個人の感想です）
なので回避枠が足りないんじゃよ…

[h1] くだらないチャットを非表示にして気持ちよく遊ぼう[/h1]
このゲームには他のFPS同様、テキストチャットが導入されている
そのチャットでどのような内容のやり取りがされているかというと、「tank diff」「dps noob」「heal？」「?????」［gg ez］などのゴミみたいな内容がほとんど（個人の感想です）
あと全体チャットを使って敵同士で煽り合うチャットバトルも多い（日本語・韓国語・中国語・英語問わず）
一応OWプレイヤーの中にも味方を褒めたりチームの士気を上げるようなチャットを書く人はいる（通称：光の戦士）
だが自分としてはこのsteam版リリースを機にオーバーウォッチ2を始めようと考えている人にはまず最初に[b] テキストチャットを非表示にすることをオススメする[/b]
やり方は簡単で、［オプション］→［ソーシャル］タブ→画面左側の［テキストチャット］をクリックして［チーム・テキストチャット］と［マッチ・テキストチャット］を両方ともOFFにする　これだけだ

「チャットを非表示にしたらチームメンバーとコミュニケーションを取るのに困るのでは？」と思われる方もいるだろう
確かにテキストチャットを非表示にすると「自分ファラを出すからマーシーをやってほしい」や「敵の◯◯が暴れているからカウンターピックを出してほしい」などのチャットも見えなくなるので、デメリットはある
しかしこれからオーバーウォッチ2を始めようとする初心者の方はチャットで戦術の話をされてもなんのこっちゃって感じだろうし、まずはチャット非表示から始めることを勧める　そしてある程度ゲームに慣れて理解度が高まってきたと思ったらチャットを表示させるのもいいだろう　[strike] そしてOWの闇に飲まれるのだ… [/strike]

[h1] Q：結局このゲームは神ゲーですか？それともクソゲーですか？ [/h1]
A：味方チームと敵チームの実力が拮抗していて、両チームにスマーフ、トロール、チーター、暴言厨がいない場合に限りこのゲームは神ゲーになります　それ以外の場合はクソゲーです

「このゲームをおすすめしますか？」と言われると非常に難しいところ
自分はOW1の頃からこのゲームを続けているが、人にオススメできるかというと微妙
まあsteam版リリースを祝ってオススメするということにしときますか

As a person with 430 hours on PC, and about 100 on xbox when Overwatch came out, this game is hell now. Originally, the game allowed you to gain ALMOST every single unlock by just playing the game (excluding limited time ones such as lego bastion, pink mercy, and the league skins). Now, in order to get older skins, you need to do most of the battlepass to get 1 legendary skin. Now with the battlepass, you would assume that (like every other game with a battlepass) it has a currency that, if you buy the premium version, can make the next one free if you complete most/all of the pass. NOPE, you get a F2P currency that you cannot buy in anyway, and is only used for old/basic skins. You can technically get the battlepass for free, if you grind for months on end and never miss a single week. You can get up to 60 credits a week, it costs 1000 credits to get the battlepass, that is AT LEAST 17 WEEKS TO GET THE BATTLEPASS. This isn't even mentioning the fact that those same credits, require 1500 credits to get a new legendary skin. Now let's get to the shitty way Blizzard locks heroes. I personally am not effected by this because I have played the game before, but for new players, you have to play the game (which is mainly about countering heroes with other heroes) with a small roster. This makes it hard for new players to try out new characters without playing hundreds of games first. 
Quickfire time because fuck it:
-Shitty, invasive, and sometimes illegal shop systems
-Bug fixes happen every season/mid-season patch, unless it is related to money
-The devs straight up lied when launching Overwatch 2 and 90% of what was in the original OW2 trailer was scrapped before it was even made public.
-Less effort overall (besides the marketing and art team) were put into the game since the release of OW2
-Balancing is even worse than anything OW1 has seen (besides GOATS, that can stay in hell)
-Who thought giving a high mobility, high damage character a one-shot was a good idea (and she still is in the game, 195 is still pretty much one shot in most situations, and Mercy exists)
-The switch to 5v5 makes some tanks feel obsolete, such as wrecking ball, due to the fact that the off-tank playstyle is a lot harder to pull off successfully with no one peeling for your team.
-They made the game EVEN MORE about winning with daily and weekly challenges that are the bulk of your BP XP (until the update that could have been added since launch)
-Removed multiple systems, and are slowly adding them back, in worse conditions.
-The MMR system is fine, but in tangent with SR, it's fucked. You can be a silver player, do really well on one match, so your MMR decides to bump you up, but your SR doesn't follow as much. So you can be in Diamond/Master matches as Silver (or the other way around). ELO Hell does exist because of this. Sure, you might not be masters, but you definitely aren't bronze.
-Almost no reason to play the arcade mode (which is supposed to be the "fun" mode) unless you want to complete challenges or if there is a limited mode.
-Speaking of limited modes, they somehow fuck those up even more. Lucio ball, the fun soccer/rocket league type mode, somehow was screwed up when it was put in the arcade during OW2. You would consistently not hit the ball and miss shots that would've scored/blocked points.
-Blizzard is making their most casual game, into a competitive game artificially with Overwatch League, and it isn't even working. 
-Lastly (and there is so much more that I could add to this, but I'm done for now), Blizzard is a shitty company and ruins anything that they touch/try to continue. Get out while you can.

Oyunu indirmeden mutlu bir şekilde kötü bir inceleme bırakmak nasıl
Değerlendirme koşulları: oyunu toplam 6 dakika boyunca asılı kalma süresi yazılımı üzerinden ekleyin

Bilgisayar tarafı:
watt araç seti (eski adıyla steam++)
ASF
SAM

Mobil terminal:
Bulut kartı uygulaması
Bir oyunu kitaplığınızdan nasıl kaldırırsınız?
Ana Sayfa > Hesap > Lisans ve Ürün Anahtarı Etkinleştirme: Kaldır'a tıklayın
veya
Destek >> Bu oyunu hesabımdan kaldırmak istiyorum

Biraz objektif değerlendirmeye gelin
Blizzard ve Caldick ölürse, sayısız insanın fırçalayacağı, her zaman nesnel bir şey hakkında konuşacağı tahmin ediliyor, aksi takdirde bazı çekingen ve tarafsız insanlar, başkalarını acı çekmeden kibar olmaya ikna eden bazı alaycı sözler söyleyecekler.

Önce iş konuşalım:
Birkaç yıl durdu ve bu, N yıldır büyük pastaları çeken Overwatch 2 mi? Değişiklikler sürüm güncellemesi kadar büyük değil.Çalışanlar bu yıllarda nelerle meşgul oldu? Ofiste cinsel taciz? Overwatch 2 fragmanının CG animasyonundaki eski oyuncuların yağmuruna bakıldığında, sadece iki kelime var gibi görünüyor: tüyler ürpertici. Karaciğeri Krypton'u kandırmaya zorlamaktan bahsetmeyeceğim zaten, bunu sadece Blizzard artık biliyor, peki ya kampanya modum? Yemin edilen PVE tekrar tekrar ertelendi ve oyuncuların bu belirsiz kelimeleri daha iyi deneyimlemesi için ağzın açılması.

Özel konulardan bahsedelim:
Hesap, eski oyuncuların gençlik anılarını taşır, arkadaşlarıyla güldüğü ve utandığı anlara tanıklık eder. Hayır diyorsan hayır, oyuncular için böyle mi dedin? Paraya bak, üşüme, dik durup doğruyu söylesen de sana olan nefretim biraz daha azalacak, daha çok aklama olacak. Çinli oyuncular önemli değil ama Çinli oyuncuların gerçek parası çok önemli.


Yeni oyuncuların çukurlardan kaçınma nedenleri
Burada, işe gider gibi oynamanın zevkini hissedebilirsiniz.
Burada, cildin sürüm güncellemesinden daha çalışkan olduğunu göreceksiniz.
Burada, otantik ve otantik Blizzard kibirini yaşayabilirsiniz.
Burada, sayısız yeni taahhütle çevrili zor kararları görebilirsiniz.
Burada Çin pazarını ve Çinli oyuncuları reddeden asil bir yabancı ürünü oynayacaksınız.Oynamadan önce başınızı ve ardından belinizi eğiniz.

Çözüm:
Kötü eleştiriler yazmazsanız, Three Kingdoms'a iyi bir inceleme yapacağım.

16年开服玩家特地下载这游戏来给它打差评
游戏时长2000小时+，当时还流传着“暴雪出品，必属精品”，没想到直接见证了一个大公司的衰落
这吊游戏陪伴了我整个高三到现在工作，不得不说游戏确实是好游戏，谁也没想到七年后的它会是这个吊样子
国服说噶就噶，我还像小丑一样在最后一个赛季差不多打满了整个赛季，打了好几个号，出了2之后，顶着傻逼定级机制和匹配机制，外加BUG+狗屎UI摁玩了整个赛季，还想着好好玩不摆烂了，结果和我说国服要去世咯
断了半年没玩，实在找不到平替，下了个亚服，上了以前的账号，看着战网里的COD16，17，真的是一顿恶心。一开始摆烂打法，因为别人说亚服容易乱封国人账号，打了一个月，感觉应该不至于，开了个小号打竞技，一点烂没摆，认真被系统狠狠制裁，高强度打了好几天冲上了宗师，然后过了一个星期给我封号了，也没说明啥理由。再上论坛一看，原来是随机抽奖封，玩枪就容易被举报，举报了就容易封号（针对国区，因为ip不稳定）。再打新号陪朋友玩，都只想玩天使摆烂了，只想消遣不想认真玩了，有时候看到对面韩文或者日文id的拿个百合猛猛杀，心里就觉得膈应，终究还是别人家，人家怎么爽玩都行，你就不行，吃几个举报就容易噶。这里确实不属于你，人家也从来不在意你，再回想起当年宏宇，粉红天使（我还买了三份），过去的终究还是过去了，现在只有答辩，爱吃不吃，现在还端上来steam了，这鸡巴游戏没有差评如潮真的是所有玩家的责任（砍pve，拿半成品卖，屎UI，BUG不修，相信外国人也不爱吃答辩吧？）

跳票特攻2

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

[h1]试想一下这款游戏是 CS: GO:[/h1]

1. CS2 变成 PVE 为主的游戏， Valve 提前卖大行动通行证，结果发布游戏的时候他们宣布不做 PVE 内容了。
2. 为了加快游戏节奏，CS2 竞技模式将变成 4V4 的队伍阵容。
3. 催债一样的每日任务，每周任务，赛季任务。
    - 危机解除：扮演任意警方探员拆除炸弹
    - 冲锋号角：使用任意 SMG 拿到首杀
    - 运气也是实力：使用任意狙击步枪不开镜获得击杀
4. 有很多大行动，免费玩家有机会获得很多地下水和狩猎网格。
5. AWP 和 M249 免费用，但是鸟狙和内格夫需要内购或者花很多时间解锁，官方宣布这不影响竞技模式的平衡性。
6. Valve 宣布新游戏刀塔 3 将发布在手机平台，玩家在发布会表达不满，G 胖问大家是不是没有手机。
哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈，当年300买首发典藏版，总游戏时常近一万，你说没就没，上架steam还不支持简中，你是真牛逼，也不看看你那b样，出生玩意

彼阳薄雪，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛腦潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。
